mapper.insert: insert into nationtb(en_name, ko_name, dust, continents,showcnt, customer, weight, speech, price) values(#{en_name},#{ko_name},#{dust},#{continents},#{showcnt},#{customer},#{weight},#{speech},#{price});
mapper.update: update nationtb set en_name=#{en_name}, ko_name=#{ko_name}, dust=#{dust}, continents=#{continents}, showcnt=#{showcnt}, customer=#{customer}, weight=#{weight}, speech=#{speech}, price=#{price} where customer=#{customer};
